title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
oscars_won_details: Special Achievement Award for Sound Effects
description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

title: Annie Hall
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
oscars_won_details: Special Achievement Award for Sound Effects Editing
description: Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO.

title: Saturday Night Fever
description: A Brooklyn teenager feels his only chance to get somewhere is as the king of the disco floor.

title: The Goodbye Girl
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: After being dumped by her live-in boyfriend, a former dancer and her daughter are forced to share their apartment with an arrogant, aspiring actor.

title: Smokey and the Bandit
description: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor-trailer full of beer over state lines, in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.

title: The Spy Who Loved Me
description: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent.

title: Julia
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The story of the lifelong friendship between two women, one of whom becomes a celebrated writer and the other an anti-Nazi activist.

title: Eraserhead
description: Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.

title: Suspiria
description: An American newcomer to a prestigious German ballet academy comes to realize that the school is a front for something sinister amid a series of grisly murders.

title: The Turning Point
description: The story of two women whose lives are dedicated to ballet. One gave up her career to have a family, while the other became a star.

title: A Bridge Too Far
description: The story of Operation Market Garden, the failed Allied attempt to break through German lines in the Netherlands during World War II.

title: Slap Shot
description: A failing ice hockey team finds success by resorting to playing violently.

title: The Rescuers

director.name: John Lounsbery, Wolfgang Reitherman, Art Stevens

description: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by treasure hunters.

title: Sorcerer
description: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives by transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous South American jungle.

title: High Anxiety
description: A psychiatrist with a fear of heights takes a job at a sanitarium and finds himself in the middle of a murder plot.

title: The Duellists
description: Two officers in Napoleon's army carry on a long-running feud.

title: That Obscure Object of Desire
description: An aging Frenchman tells the story of his frustrating and surreal relationship with a beautiful and elusive young woman.

title: The American Friend
description: A con man in Hamburg, Germany, involves a picture framer in a murder plot.

title: Pumping Iron
description: A documentary about the world of professional bodybuilding, focusing on the rivalry between Arnold Schwarzenegger and Lou Ferrigno.

title: New York, New York
description: An egotistical saxophone player and a rising pop singer fall in love and get married, but their careers and personal conflicts drive them apart.

title: Cross of Iron
description: A German sergeant on the Eastern Front in World War II clashes with his new captain, who is obsessed with winning the Iron Cross.

title: The Hills Have Eyes
description: On the way to California, a family has the misfortune to have their car break down in an area closed to the public, and inhabited by violent savages.

title: Oh, God!
description: God appears to a mild-mannered supermarket manager and chooses him to be his messenger in the modern world.

title: The Gauntlet
description: A hard-bitten cop is assigned to escort a prostitute from Las Vegas to Phoenix, but they find that they are being pursued by both the mob and the police.

title: Equus
description: A psychiatrist tries to treat a young man who has a pathological religious fascination with horses.

title: A Special Day
description: On the day of Hitler's 1938 visit to Rome, a lonely housewife and a persecuted homosexual form an unlikely friendship.

title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
description: A collection of animated shorts based on the stories of A.A. Milne.

title: House (Hausu)
description: A schoolgirl and her six friends travel to her aunt's country home, which turns out to be a carnivorous, supernatural entity.

title: Jabberwocky
description: A medieval peasant must slay a monster to win the hand of a princess.

title: Demon Seed
description: A scientist creates a supercomputer that develops a mind of its own and decides it wants to have a child with the scientist's wife.

title: The Car
description: A mysterious black car terrorizes a small Southwestern town.

title: 3 Women
description: The strange and enigmatic relationship between three women in a small desert town.

title: Airport '77
description: Art thieves hijack a 747, hit fog and crash into the ocean, trapping them and the passengers under one hundred feet of water.

title: Orca
description: A killer whale goes on a rampage after its mate and calf are killed by a fisherman.

title: Exorcist II: The Heretic
description: A teenage girl once possessed by a demon finds that it still lurks within her. Meanwhile, a priest investigates the death of the girl's exorcist.

title: Looking for Mr. Goodbar
description: A dedicated schoolteacher for deaf children leads a promiscuous and dangerous double life in the singles bars of New York City.

title: Providence
description: An aging, alcoholic writer on the eve of his 78th birthday, works on his novel while his family gathers for a birthday celebration.

title: The Late Show
description: An aging private detective and a kooky aspiring actress team up to solve a murder case.

title: Pete's Dragon
description: An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to a small town in New England.

title: Semi-Tough
description: Two football players and their roommate get involved in a love triangle.
